title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Pearl River, Guangzhou
content:
Photo submitted by Michael Huang, “I am from Guangzhou City China, I enjoyed riding along the mother river of the city, Pearl River, on my own brand ‘CAFFEINE’ handmade steel/carbon bike.” We always love seeing photos from where you are riding and are happy to share them with our readers around the world here on the

The post Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Pearl River, Guangzhou appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Kristi Benedict
